precaution: Make sure there is no object on the table that you can knock over.
instruction: Sit upright at the table with your right arm resting comfortably on the surface.
Place your right hand palm-down or neutral on the table.
Slowly slide your right hand forward, straightening your elbow as much as is comfortable.
Then slide your hand back toward your body, bending the elbow.
Repeat the forward and backward movement 3–5 times in a smooth, controlled manner.
